00123             template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00124                 struct ConstructLoop {
00125                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]);
00126                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]);

00131             template <unsigned D_, unsigned j>
00132                 struct ConstructLoop<D_, 0, j> {
00133                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]);
00134                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]);

00139             template <unsigned D_, unsigned i>
00140                 struct ConstructLoop<D_, i, 0> {
00141                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]);
00142                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]);
00143                 };

00147             template <unsigned D_>
00148                 struct ConstructLoop<D_, 0, 0> {
00150 
00152                     static void row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00153                         a[0][0] = (N)1;
00154                     }
00156 
00158                     static void col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00159                         a[0][0] = (N)1;
00160                     }
00161             };

00324 
00326 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00327     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix() {
00328         ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00329     }
00330 
00332 
00341 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00342     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(unsigned axis1, unsigned axis2, N alpha) {
00343         // costruct a unity matrix first
00344         ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00345         // then replace the appropriate elements by sin/cos of the rotation angle
00346         N s = sin (alpha), c = cos (alpha);
00347         data_[axis1][axis1] =  data_[axis2][axis2] = c;
00348         data_[axis1][axis2] = -s;
00349         data_[axis2][axis1] = s;
00350 
00351       }
00352 
00354 
00359 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00360     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix(bool random) {
00361         if (random) {
00362             for(unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00363                 for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00364                     data_[i][j] = random? N (rand ())/RAND_MAX: 0;
00365                 if (!random) data_[i][i] = 1;
00366             }
00367         }
00368         else {
00369             ConstructLoop<D, D-1, D-1>::row_loop (data_);
00370         }
00371     }
00372 
00374 
00377 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00378     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N a[D][D]) {
00379         CopyLoop<D-1, D-1, D>::copy_row (a, data_);
00380     }
00381 
00382 
00384 
00389 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00390     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Matrix (const N *a) {
00391         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00392             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00393                 data_[i][j] = a[i*D+j];
00394     }

00399 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00400     inline N
00401         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j) const {
00402             assert (i < D);
00403             assert (j < D);
00404             return data_[i][j];
00405         }

00424 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00425     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>
00426         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator* (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00427             Matrix<D, N> tmp;
00428             Multiply<D>::multiply (data_, other.data_, tmp.data_);
00429             return tmp;
00430         }

00437 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00438     inline VecMath::Matrix<D, N>
00439     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator*= (const Matrix<D, N>& other) {
00440         Matrix<D, N> tmp (*this);
00441         Multiply<D>::multiply (tmp.data_, other.data_, data_);
00442         return *this;
00443      }

00446 
00449 template <unsigned D, typename N>
00450     VecMath::Vector<D, N>
00451     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::operator * (const VecMath::Vector<D, N> &V) {
00452         Vector<D, N> W;
00453         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                              //      i: row
00454             N s = 0;
00455             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                    //      j: col
00456                 s += data_[i][j]*V[j];
00457             W[i] = s;
00458         }
00459         return W;
00460     }

00465 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00466     void
00467         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::print () {
00468             std::cout << D << "x" << D << ":";
00469             for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00470                 std::cout << (i > 0? " |": "") << std::endl << "|";
00471                 for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00472                     std::cout << std::setw (6) << std::setprecision (3)
00473                               << operator ()(i, j);
00474             }
00475             std::cout << " |" << std::endl;
00476         }

00496     template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00497         inline void
00498         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::row_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00499             ConstructLoop<D, i, j>::col_loop(a);
00500             ConstructLoop<D, i-1, j>::row_loop(a);
00501         }

00512 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00513     template<unsigned D_, unsigned i, unsigned j>
00514         inline void
00515         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::ConstructLoop<D_, i, j>::col_loop (N a[D][D]) {
00516             ConstructLoop<D, i, j-1>::col_loop(a);
00517             a[i][j] = (i == j? (N)1: (N)0);
00518         }

00602 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00603     template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00604     inline void
00605     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k, D_>::loop (
00606             const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00607         c[i][j] += a[i][k]*b[k][j];
00608         MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, k-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00609       }

00621 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00622     template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00623         inline void
00624         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, 0, D_>::loop (
00625                 const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00626         c[i][j] += a[i][0]*b[0][j];
00627       }

00646 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00647     template <unsigned i, unsigned j, unsigned D_>
00648         inline void
00649         VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MultiplyColLoop<i, j, D_>::loop (
00650                 const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {
00651             c[i][j] = 0;
00652             MultiplyInnerLoop<i, j, D-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00653             MultiplyColLoop<i, j-1, D>::loop (a, b, c);
00654         }

00668                 const N a[D][D], const N b[D][D], N c[D][D]) {

00736 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00737   Matrix<D-1, N>
00738     VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::matrix_minor (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00739       throw new NotYetImplementedException ();
00740       Matrix<D-1, N> tmp;
00741       for (unsigned I = 0, II = 0; I < D; I++)
00742         if (I != i) {
00743         for (unsigned J = 0, JJ = 0; J < D; J++)
00744           if (J != j) {
00745           tmp (II, JJ) = *this (I, J);
00746           JJ++;
00747           }
00748           II++;
00749         }
00750         return tmp;
00751   }

00753 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00754   template<unsigned D_>
00755     inline N
00756       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Det<D_>::det (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00757         return SumLoop<D, D-1>::sumloop (a);
00758       }
00759 
00760 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00761   template<typename N_>
00762     inline N_
00763       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Det<1, N_>::det (/*const*/ N_ a[1][1]) {
00764         return a[0][0];
00765       }
00766 
00767 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00768   template<unsigned D_, int i>
00769     inline N
00770       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, i>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D])  {
00771         N **tmp1 = Minor<i, 0, D>::minor(a);
00772         N tmp2 = a[i][0]
00773                   * Det<D-1>::det(tmp1)
00774                   * ( (i&1)? -1: 1 )
00775                   + SumLoop<D, i-1>::sumloop (a);
00776         delete[] tmp1;
00777         return tmp2;
00778       }
00779 
00780 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00781   template<unsigned D_>
00782     inline N
00783       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop<D_, 0>::sumloop (/*const*/ N a[D][D]) {
00784         N **tmp1 = Minor<0, 0, D_>::minor (a);
00785         N tmp2 = a[0][0] * Det<D-1>::det (tmp1);
00786         delete [] tmp1;
00787         return tmp2;
00788       }

00790 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00791   template<typename N_>
00792     inline N_
00793       VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::SumLoop <0, 0, N_>::sumloop (const N_ a[1][1]) {
00794         return a[0][0];
00795       }
00796 */
00797 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00798     template<unsigned k, unsigned D_>
00799         inline void
00800             VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::MinorLoop<k, D_>::minorloop (N ** a, N **tmp) {
00801               tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00802               MinorLoop<k-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00803           }

00809               tmp[0] = a[1]+1;
00810             }
00811 
00812 template<unsigned D, typename N>
00813     template<unsigned i, unsigned D_>
00814         inline /*const*/ N **
00815             VecMath::Matrix<D, N>::Minor<i, 0, D_>::minor (/*const*/ N **a) {
00816               /*const*/ N **tmp = new /*const*/ N* [D-1];  //  watch out for memory leaks here!
00817                                                         //  the caller must free this memory!
00818               for (unsigned k = 1; k < D; k++)
00819                 tmp[k-1] = a[k]+1;
00820               //    MinorLoop<D-1, D>::minorloop (a, tmp);
00821               return tmp;
00822             }
